ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned very valuable writing strategies, particularly regarding crafting arguments and laying evidence out effectively.

The most important knowledge that I gained from this course was the ability to organize my thinking in a logical way. We begin with the basicstopic sentences and claimsand work our way up to the minute details within sentencesgrammar, punctuation, formatting.
I developed my analytical writing capabilities and my abilities in reading scholarly work and comprehending it.
After taking this course, I now have a deeper appreciation for authentic experiences and travel. In addition, my writing is now more concise and impactful.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The strength is that a lot of information and material is provided. The weakness is inherent to the fast-paced 5 week course.
It would have been better if it was not online, but the discussions always provided insights into the reading that I did not see. I really enjoyed the thorough discussions.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: I would recommend this course to another student who is looking to improve their academic writing.

This class requires a lot of effort. It is NOT an easy A. But that being said, my writing has become a lot more concise and clear. This class is designed for those who are serious about improving their writing.
I would highly recommend this course to another student who is interested in travel. This course completely changed the way that I view tourism and corporate advertisement.

narratives.question_text: The Canvas course site allowed me to identify and access required course materials easily.
